A leaf, still attached to its tree, holds on tight as the tree is blown away in a storm.
A leaf, still attached to its tree, watches as the tree is cut down for firewood.
A leaf, still attached to its tree, waits for the right moment to fall and join the rest.
A leaf, still attached to its tree, remembers a time when it was free to fly.
A leaf, still attached to its tree, wonders if it will ever get to see the world from above.
